verses.roman:
karite samartha tumi hao, dayāmaya
tumi mana kara, tabe anāyāse haya

synonyms: karite—to execute; samartha—capable; tumi—You; hao—are; dayā-maya—O merciful one; tumi mana kara—if You so desire; tabe—then; anāyāse—without difficulty; haya—it becomes possible.
translation: "My Lord, You are certainly capable of doing whatever You like, and You are indeed merciful. If You so desire, You can very easily do whatever You want.
